user_query: My family and I are planning a road trip and we want to create a playlist of our favorite songs. Can you fetch a playlist from Spotify and provide us with the details? We would also like to retrieve the lyrics for these songs from the SongMeanings API.

TaskList.description: Fetch a playlist from Spotify based on the user's favorite songs.
Retrieve lyrics for the songs in the fetched playlist from the SongMeanings API.
